title: Yagi (Letraset)
content:
I stumbled upon this fantastic face in the Font ID guides ( [http://bowfinprintworks.com/BauhausFaces.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112054544/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/BauhausFaces.html "http://bowfinprintworks.com/BauhausFaces.html")) Has this been digitalised and if so where can i buy it?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [YagiUnivNo.2.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112054544/http:/typophile.com/files/YagiUnivNo.2.gif) | 16.82 KB |
author: xen

comments.content:
No information on digitisations I'm afraid, but I can show this from my trusty old Letraset catalogue.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112054544im_/http:/typophile.com/files/yagi%20link%20double.jpg)

Richard

Thanks Richard,

The yagi link double version is also the only one i can find any info about. Besides the Font ID guide, not one site can tell me anything about the Yagi Universal No.2 Version..

Anyone else that could shed more light onto this?
